thread.section_title: BookIt.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BookIt.com | bookit.com | 3 of 697
thread.title: Dakota Brod

author: Dakota Brod
title: Dakota Brod
text: My fianc√© and I were booking our honeymoon online and had gotten to the end to submit payment and confirm our trip and an error message came up! We contacted customer service and conference called them so all three of us could be on the phone at once -- it was a breeze for the representative to plug in our information and get us our same trip information back into the system! He was friendly and even applied our same discount we had originally applied without question! Very helpful and would recommend booking over the phone directly with an agent for how helpful they are!
